Immediate long term position in Downey, CA for Wordpress developer / Admin

Dear Brian, 

Greetings!

We have an immediate long term position in Downey, CA for Wordpress developer / Admin: 

- Experience in working with multiple websites 
- Good experience in backend technologies
- Experience with Drupal/ PHP 4.X
- Skilled in website security technologies 
- Experience in cloud platforms like open shift and AWS 

Please send profile to mamta_makwana@trinus.com 

Thanks,
Mamta

Mamta Makwana
mamta_makwana@Trinus.com
NP. Thanks for your quick response.
Sure want to one up each other?
